TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TE: Discover What Our Users Are Saying
TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Real experiences from people who've found their next favorite product
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: This app revolutionized my shopping experience! I've discovered so many unique products I never knew existed.
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: As a tech enthusiast, I'm always on the hunt for the latest gadgets. This app has become my go-to resource for finding cutting-edge products.
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: I love how this app introduces me to eco-friendly alternatives. It's made sustainable shopping so much easier!
STARTER_TEMPLATE_CALL_TO_ACTION_TITLE: Discover the Latest and Greatest Products
STARTER_TEMPLATE_CALL_TO_ACTION_SUBTITLE: Your gateway to innovative and exciting new items hitting the market
CONTACT_FORM_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Tell us about your interests and we'll help you find amazing new products!
CONTACT_FORM_TEXT_FIELD_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Any Specific Features You're Looking For?
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_1: AI-powered device for seamless home automation
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_2: Insulated, BPA-free bottle with built-in filter
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_3: True wireless earbuds with long battery life
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_4: Compact solar panel for on-the-go charging

CTA_BODY: Explore a world of innovative and exciting new products tailored to your interests and needs. Our app makes finding your next must-have item effortless and fun.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: How does the product discovery app work?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Our app uses advanced algorithms and user preferences to suggest new and exciting products tailored to your interests. Simply create a profile, browse categories, and start discovering unique items you'll love.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: Is the app free to use?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: Yes, the basic version of our app is completely free to use. We also offer a premium subscription with additional features for those who want an enhanced product discovery experience.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: Can I purchase products directly through the app?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: While our app focuses on product discovery, we provide direct links to trusted retailers where you can purchase the items you're interested in. We ensure a seamless transition from discovery to purchase.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: How often are new products added to the app?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: We update our product database daily to ensure you always have access to the latest and most innovative items. Our team works tirelessly to curate a diverse and exciting selection of products across various categories.
NEWSLETTER_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Discover the Latest and Greatest Products
HERO_SUBTITLE: Uncover trending products and hidden gems with our cutting-edge discovery platform
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Everything you need to know about discovering new products with our app
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: How does the app help me find new products?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our app uses advanced algorithms and user preferences to curate a personalized selection of new and exciting products tailored to your interests and shopping habits.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: Is the app free to use?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: Yes, our app is completely free to download and use. We may offer premium features in the future, but our core product discovery service will always be free.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: How often are new products added to the app?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: We update our product database daily, ensuring that you always have access to the latest and most innovative items on the market.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: Can I purchase products directly through the app?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: While we don't handle transactions directly, our app provides links to trusted retailers where you can purchase the products you discover.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: How does the app ensure product quality?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: We carefully vet all products and sellers before featuring them in our app. Additionally, we incorporate user reviews and ratings to help you make informed decisions about product quality.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_HERO_SECONDARY_TITLE: Explore, Compare, and Find the Best New Items on the Market
FEATURE_1_BODY: Stay ahead of the curve with our curated selection of the latest and most popular products across various categories.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Get tailored product suggestions based on your preferences, browsing history, and purchase behavior.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Make informed decisions with authentic user feedback and product ratings from real customers.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Find the best deals by comparing prices from multiple retailers and online marketplaces.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Set up notifications for new releases, price drops, and restocks on products you're interested in.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Share your favorite discoveries with friends and family, and see what products are trending in your social network.

LANDING_PAGE_HERO_TEXT: Your Gateway to Innovation and Trends
LANDING_PAGE_SUB_HERO_TEXT: Uncover exciting new products from around the world, curated just for you. Stay ahead of the curve and be the first to know about game-changing innovations.
